cd:instance.name: secondaryAggregate
cd:instance.description: While the aggregate is computed per instance, the 'secondaryAggregate' joins these results over the instance groups or all instances. Let's say you want to compute the standard deviation of your objective values for each instance. In order to have a diagram over all instances or a specific group of instances, you now need to aggregate these values over that group. You could use the 'median' for that purpose.
